fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: H2020, Security including Border management, Security Research, Cyber Security, Defense, EU Maritime policy, Civil Protection and Crisis management, Cohesion Policy, Neighboring policy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: AIAD, Confindustria, EOS (European Organization for Security)
goals__remit: Elettronica, founded in 1951, is one of the European leaders in the production of Electronic Defence equipment (EW). Elettronica supplies all solutions, systems and products in the EW field: from interception capacity during law enforcement operations to surveillance of risk areas, to the self-protection of platforms in hostile zones, up to monitoring the electro-magnetic scenario. The Company's systems are in service with the Armed Forces of 28 countries in 5 continents.
